response.overview: On April 4th, catch the adrenaline-pumping action of Josh Barnett's Bloodsport X live and exclusively on TrillerTV+ straight from the heart of Philadelphia, PA, at Penns Landing Caterers. The event features an electrifying Women's 4 Way Tournament.  The first announced matches are:  Fuminori Abe vs Takuya Nomura  Nic Nemeth vs "Speedball" Mike Bailey  Timothy Thatcher vs Axel Tischer  Matt Makowski vs Akira  Shayna Baszler vs Masha Slamovich  Erik Hammer vs Lou Nixon  Minoru Suzuki vs Royce Isaacs  Josh Barnett vs Johnny Bloodsport (John Hennigan)  *lineup subject to change
response.title: GCW Josh Barnett's Bloodsport X
